short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overrides a button to display YouTube stats in a popup instead of a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usage: Install ViewStats extension first, After that install this extension. Now View Stats button on YouTube Channel will work as a popup.

Easily access detailed analytics for any YouTube channel with the Tube Stats Dashboard Popup extension. This handy tool allows you to view comprehensive channel statistics directly in a convenient popup window.

Features:

	•	Instant Analytics Access: Quickly open the Tube Stats Dashboard for the YouTube channel you’re currently viewing.
	•	Popup Interface: The extension replaces the default button action with a popup interface, so you don’t need to open new tabs or leave the page.
	•	User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive design, with a close button for easy dismissal.

Transform how you analyze YouTube channels by integrating essential stats into your browsing experience. Perfect for content creators, marketers, and analytics enthusiasts who need instant insights without disrupting their workflow.

How to Use:

	1.	Navigate to any YouTube channel.
	2.	Click the Tube Stats button to open the analytics dashboard in a popup window.
